name: Assasin of the Night
description:
You are an assasin on the run. The only way forward is through the castle. Where you are wanted dead.

A short, tactical stealth / turn-based / roguelike hybrid where every move counts.

// Controls:

- WASD or arrow keys to move

- Walk into an enemy to attack it

- Walk into a wall to pass a turn

// Known Bugs (which I didn't have time to fix :-$)

- Wall Phasing
